help-file.title: "GOD, RESTORE"
help-file.content:
When used on a mortal, "restore" restores their hit points, mana, and movement points to full.
When used on an immortal, "restore" also resets various fields to their proper values.
Immortals should take cautionary measures if they decide to restore a player, as this is normally frowned upon.
Syntax: restore <character>
